reviews.title: Does what it is advertising
reviews.name: Seth Kriticos
reviews.review: This is actually a very nice product when looking at the superstructure. The umbrella part is easy to setup and does what it is set out to do. Main problem is really the attachment part. The metal struts bite into the head, making them fairly uncomfortable. The leash around the chin for keeping the umbrella in place is also fairly uncomfortable. Main issue though is, that it can not withstand any kind of wind. Even a smaller gust will rip that thing off the head unless bound uncomfortably tight. My wife also refuses to take me on expeditions with the umbrella on.Overall I find the idea really nice and it's sad that this cheap device is the only offering on Amazon.

reviews.title: Keeps you dry if you don't mind funny looks.

reviews.review: What can I say, if you don't mind funny looks, it's great.  I may keep this to night time photography when no one can see me, but think it will keep me and the camera dry :)  Has a camo style print on the inside, sort of think it should be inside out with plain grey on inside on camo on outside.

reviews.title: Buona stabilit√† sulla testa emani libere

reviews.review: Molto leggero e facile da fissare sulla testa. La sua ampia apertura permette di coprire le spalle molto bene, ma la cosa pi√π importante √® che mi permette di avere libere le mani per portare il cane a passeggio nelle piovose giornate. Buon acquisto!

reviews.title: Really good, keeps your hands free whilst protecting you from the rain
reviews.name: Valentina
reviews.review: Easy to use, comfy fit and the laces keep it in place even with the wind. I use it during rainy hikes, so I keep my hands free, particularly useful on hills or difficult terrain when you might need to use your hands to prevent you from falling! Great also for other daily activities (ie food shopping) when it rains. Love it

reviews.title: Regenschirm am Kopf Tragend
reviews.name: Tomislav Muranji
reviews.review: Einmal habe ich diesen Schirm beim Regen zum Fotografieren getragen. War TOP, die Linse der Kamera ist Trocken geblieben. Eine manko gab es, die Blicke der Menschen. Doch war auch Lustig. Nun die Europ√§err sind solche Inovationen nicht gewohnt. Im nach hinein war lustig wie Blicke angezogen hatte der Regenschirm. Ist undurchl√§ssig, beim Wind ist acht zu geben. Zu empf√§hlen f√ºr Fotografen. Auch in anderen lebenslagen ist sehr hilfsreich.

reviews.title: Junk

reviews.review: Even as a joke item this is just junk quality. Arrived with a hole in it, where they just hadn't stitched it together at all. The materials are all unbelievably cheap and thin. Wouldn't give a fiver for it.

Non ho ancora avuto occasione di provarlo sul campo ma, provandola a casa, sembra ben fatto ed assolvere lo scopo per chi l‚Äôho acquistato. Direi quindi che ha un buon rapporto costo efficacia ed √® un oggetto che infiler√≤ nella tasca dello zaino tutte le volte che uscir√≤ a fare foto con tempo variabile o brutto
